thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 26 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Henderson Alternative Strategies Agreed Changes With Alternative Investment Fund Manager

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Henderson Alternative Strategies Agreed Changes With Alternative Investment Fund Manager

organizations.name: reuters) - henderson alternative strategies trust plc

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Henderson Alternative Strategies Trust Plc:
* HAS AGREED CHANGES WITH COMPANY‘S ALTERNATIVE INVESTMENT FUND MANAGER, HENDERSON INVESTMENT FUNDS LIMITED
* MANAGEMENT FEE RATE WILL BE REDUCED TO 0.60% PER ANNUM ON FIRST £250M OF NET ASSET VALUE AND 0.55% PER ANNUM IN EXCESS THEREOF Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
